hero.title: Your Journey with
hero.description: Professional executive transfers for your important appointments. Punctuality, discretion and comfort guaranteed.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Wagner, a professional executive driver dedicated to providing the best transportation experience for your important appointments. With years of experience, I guarantee safety, punctuality and discretion on every trip.
about.feature1Desc: Responsible driver attentive to every detail
about.feature2Desc: Always on time, no exceptions or delays
about.feature3Desc: Executive attitude and discretion on all trips

services.title: Main Destinations
services.description: I provide executive transfers to the main destinations in the region. Personalized trips according to your needs.

vehicle.title: My Vehicle
vehicle.subtitle: Toyota Corolla Cross Hybrid - Comfort and Technology
vehicle.feature1Desc: Hybrid engine for sustainability and absolute silence
vehicle.feature2Desc: Premium seats with air conditioning and total comfort
vehicle.feature3Desc: Generous trunk for your luggage and belongings

cta.title: Ready for your next trip?
cta.description: Contact me now to book your executive transfer. I respond quickly!

footer.tagline: Professional Driver | Comfort and Safety Guaranteed
